document.full_text: dirk nowitzki delivered a shooting masterclass for the dallas mavericks on tuesday, scoring 48 points to spark a 121-112 victory over the oklahoma city thunder in game one of the western conference finals.
document.title: prolific nowitzki helps mavs silence thunder in opener
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki delivered a shooting masterclass for the dallas mavericks on tuesday, scoring 48 points to spark a 121-112 victory over the oklahoma city thunder in game one of the western conference finals.
